metadata.description: Name of the Budget. It should be unique within a resource group.
The total amount of cost or usage to track with the budget
The time covered by a budget. Tracking of the amount will be reset based on the time grain.
The start date must be first of the month in YYYY-MM-DD format. Future start date should not be more than three months. Past start date should be selected within the timegrain preiod.
The end date for the budget in YYYY-MM-DD format. If not provided, we default this to 10 years from the start date.
Threshold value associated with a notification. Notification is sent when the cost exceeded the threshold. It is always percent and has to be between 0.01 and 1000.
Threshold value associated with a notification. Notification is sent when the cost exceeded the threshold. It is always percent and has to be between 0.01 and 1000.
The list of email addresses to send the budget notification to when the threshold is exceeded.
